caption: Relating to repealing certain offenses and removing certain regulations relating to marihuana, cannabis, cannabinoids, synthetic cannabinoids, and paraphernalia.
summary: This bill repeals various laws related to marijuana and cannabis regulation in Texas. It removes marijuana-related offenses from criminal statutes, eliminates penalties for possession/delivery of marijuana, removes marijuana from drug paraphernalia laws, and deletes references to marijuana in education, insurance, and other codes. No specific provisions target Chinese immigrants, though the changes would affect all Texas residents equally regarding marijuana laws.
translation: 该法案废除了德克萨斯州与大麻相关的各项法律。它从刑事法规中删除了与大麻相关的犯罪，取消了持有/运输大麻的处罚，将大麻从毒品相关用具法律中移除，并删除了教育法、保险法等法规中涉及大麻的内容。虽然没有专门针对中国移民的条款，但这些变更将平等地影响所有德克萨斯州居民在大麻相关法律方面的权利义务。
